posts.post_title: FS or Trade:  T206 Cobb Red PSA 4
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Joann
Starting my Collection of 25 - General.  $1150 (shipped/insured) or equivalent value in current value of other card or combo of cards from list below.  For trades, cash can go either way to make it even.

Want List:

T206 Matty White
T206 Young Portrait
T206 Johnson Portrait
1921 Exhibit Ruth
33 Goudey Ruth Yellow or 144
N162 Baseball player
1914 CJ Detroiter
E90-1 Oakes
T202 Cobb Steals Third
E107 Detroiter
E93 Phillippe
N184 Oakley
E95 Cobb
T227 Cobb
N43 Getzin
T206 Cobb Bat Off (would prefer lower grade than 4 plus other card(s) or cash for even)

Prefer G-VGish or better on grades (so I'm thinking I'm probably out of contention on the E95 and T227 but listed them anyways).  Eye appeal is more important than technical grade.

Email above.  Back scan on request.  Thanks.

Joann
